Vũng Tàu is a ward of Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, forming the historical centre of the formet eponymous city. The iconic Front Beach (Bãi Trước) and the eponymous parklands as well as the former place of Vũng Tàu Market, which is now the Trưng Vương Square, are all located in this ward.
